title: Department 56 SNOWP Let's BE Jolly Hanging Ornament
features: “Let’s Be Jolly” hanging Christmas ornament from the Department 56 Snowpinions collection
Snowpinions feature sweet and sassy sentiments for the holidays
Showcases a curious snowman peeking out from his hand-knit scarf with “let’s be jolly” messaging
Handcrafted from high-quality bisque porcelain with hand-painted accents
description: Snowpinions are sweet and sassy sentiments that relay just the right message for the holidays. Handcrafted from creamy bisque porcelain, highly detailed Snowpinions bring life and character to any holiday scene. A bashful, rosy-cheeked snowman peeks out from his hand-knit scarf with the message: “let’s be jolly.” Hand-painted accents provide a distinctive artistic touch that ensures each item will remain a treasured piece for years to come. Snowpinions come boxed in decorative packaging for easy gifting. For over 30 years, artist Kristi Jensen Pierro has captured the beauty and splendor of winter through her many giftware collections with Department 56, including the popular Snowpinions line. About Us: Enesco is committed to bringing joy every day. The premier global destination for high-quality giftware, plush, and home décor, our prestigious family of brands includes: GUND, Department 56 Village, Gregg Gift, Foundations, Jim Shore Heartwood Creek, Disney Traditions by Jim Shore, Walt Disney Archives Collection, Disney Showcase Collection, Disney by Britto, Pusheen, Designs by Lolita, Our Name Is Mud, and many more.
